org.apdplat.word.segmentation.impl

Class AbstractSegmentation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apdplat.word.segmentation.impl.AbstractSegmentation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DictionaryBasedSegmentation, Segmentation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BidirectionalMaximumMatching, BidirectionalMaximumMinimumMatching, BidirectionalMinimumMatching, FullSegmentation, MaximumMatching, MaxNgramScore, MinimalWordCount, MinimumMatching, ReverseMaximumMatching, ReverseMinimumMatching

    public abstract class AbstractSegmentation
extends Object
implements DictionaryBasedSegmentation
    基于词典的分词算法抽象类
    Author:
    杨尚川
